channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Constructions and Isotopies of High-Dimensional Legendrian Spheres
item.description: arXiv:2211.00773v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We explore the construction of Legendrian spheres in contact manifolds of any dimension. Two constructions involving open books work in any contact manifold, while one introduced by Ekholm works only in $\mathbb{R}^{2n+1}$. We show that these three constructions are isotopic to the Legendrian unknot, thus recovering and generalising a result of Courte and Ekholm, that shows Ekholm's doubling procedure produces the standard Legendrian unknot.
item.dc:creator: Agniva Roy

item.title: Eight-dimensional non completely reducible symplectic Lie algebras
item.description: arXiv:2506.13699v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: A non completely reducible symplectic Lie algebra is a symplectic Lie algebra which cannot be symplectically reduced to the trivial symplectic Lie algebra. Our aim is to provide a complete classification, up to symplectomorphism of non completely reducible symplectic Lie algebras in dimensions $n \leq 8$ and, furthermore, to provide a complete description of symplectic Lie algebras admitting one-dimensional isotropic ideals.
item.dc:creator: T. A\"it Aissa, S. El Bourkadi, M. W. Mansouri, SM. Sbai
